description: Open redirect vulnerability in GroupSession Free edition ver5.1.1 and earlier, GroupSession byCloud ver5.1.1 and earlier, and GroupSession ZION ver5.1.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks by having a user to access a specially crafted URL.

product.name: GroupSession Free edition, GroupSession byCloud, GroupSession ZION

enisaIdProduct.product_version: GroupSession Free edition ver5.1.1 and earlier, GroupSession byCloud ver5.1.1 and earlier, and GroupSession ZION ver5.1.1 and earlier
